power.title: Adrenaline Strike
power.fluff: Your allies feel a rush of emotion with each blow they land

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you or an ally hits the target of this attack, that character can shift 1 square as a free reaction.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Battle Flow
power.fluff: Your attack draws strength from a foe to fuel the movement of you and your allies

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and one ally you can see shifts 2 squares as a free reaction.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and one ally you can see shifts 1 square as a free reaction.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is affected by your flow bonding (save ends).
Until the flow bonding ends, whenever the target takes a move action, choose either yourself or one ally you can see. The chosen character can shift 2 squares as an opportunity reaction.

power.title: Battleborn Acuity
power.fluff: You shine like a beacon, lighting the way to victory

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, your space and all squares adjacent to you are brightly lit, and the squares adjacent to the bright light are dimly lit. While in a brightly lit square, allies gain both a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Foretaste of Death
power.fluff: Your attack causes a foe to be overcome with a vision of its own death, hindering its effectiveness in combat

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target has visions of its own death (save ends).
Until the visions end, the target cannot gain combat advantage, cannot flank, and grants combat advantage.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target takes 10 psychic damage.

power.title: Implanted Suggestion
power.fluff: You compel your enemy to open itself to attack

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is affected by your suggestion (save ends).

Until the suggestion ends, whenever the target makes an attack, one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as an opportunity reaction. The target is not aware of this effect.

power.title: Lingering Fury
power.fluff: You smash your enemy aside, leaving it shrouded in a lingering fury that grants power to your allies

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The a lingering fury emanates from the target (save ends).
While fury is emanating from the target, allies adjacent to it gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a +2 power bonus to damage rolls.

power.title: Mental Turmoil
power.fluff: You transform your oppoent's frustration about its own mistakes into your allies' elation

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum -2 penalty) (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier (minimum -1 penalty) (save ends).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target misses with a melee attack, either you or one ally adjacent to you gains temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Recursive Emotions
power.fluff: Your foe's attempt to shake off the emotional onslaught of your attack harms other enemies while also restoring vigor to your allies

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is under emotional onslaught (save ends).

While under onslaught, the target takes ongoing 5 psychic damage. Whenever it attempts a saving throw against this effect, one enemy closest to the target takes psychic damage equal to 3 + your [Constitution or Wisdom] modifier, and one ally you can see regains the same number of hit points.

power.title: Wormhole Plunge
power.fluff: Your foe falls through a hole in space and appears some distance away from you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You teleport the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier, and then one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free reaction.
You create a zone of dimensional instability in the space that the target vacated until the end of your next turn.
Any creature that starts its turn within 3 squares of the zone is pulled 1 square toward the zone or into it. On your next turn, you can use the following action once:

section.name: Free Action:
section.text: You teleport one creature in the zone 3 squares.
